channel.title: Haggai on Christian Internet Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Haggai on Christian Internet Resources

item.title: Haggai 1
item.description:
Haggai Chapter 1

1 The First Day, Sixth Month, Second Year of King Darius A Message from Yahveh to the Prophet Haggai for Zerubbabel Ben-Shealtiel, Governor of Judah, and for Joshua Ben-Jehozadak, the High Priest, God’s Call to Rebuild the Temple 2"Yahveh says, ‘These people are saying this is no time to be rebuilding Yahveh’s Temple.’"

3 A message came by Haggai, 4"Is this a time for you to be living in your paneled houses while my Temple lies in ruins?" 5"Think about how things are going for you!

item.title: Haggai 2
item.description:
Haggai Chapter 2

1 The Twenty-First Day, Seventh Month A Message from Yahveh to Haggai The New Temple’s Lesser Beauty 2"Ask Zerubbabel, Joshua/Jeshua the high priest, and the remnant, 3’How many of you saw this Temple in its former beauty? How does it look to you now? Doesn’t it seem like nothing in comparison? 4But resolve to work because I’m with you. 5Like I promised when you came out of Egypt, my Spirit’s among you so you needn’t be afraid!’
